source_sql:
SELECT
  td.source_url AS doc_url,
  td.source_record_pk,
  td.content_type,
  td.raw_path,
  i.initiative_id,
  CASE
    WHEN td.content_type LIKE 'application/pdf%' THEN 'pdf'
    WHEN td.content_type LIKE 'text/html%' THEN 'html'
    ELSE 'other'
  END AS doc_kind
FROM text_documents td
LEFT JOIN parl_initiative_documents pid ON pid.source_record_pk = td.source_record_pk
LEFT JOIN parl_initiatives i ON i.initiative_id = pid.initiative_id
WHERE td.source_id = 'parl_initiative_docs'
  AND (td.text_excerpt IS NULL OR trim(td.text_excerpt) = '')
ORDER BY td.source_record_pk
LIMIT 120;
